name: The Art of the Real
description:
So I wasn’t planning on entering the latest Brackey’s jam as I didn’t really have time but I always keep an eye out for themes and when I saw ‘It is not real’ this idea popped into my head and I just had to make it. It’s not exactly polished but I’ve spent as much time on it as I can. It’s not so much a game as a kind of experiment; I hope you find it interesting, thought provoking or entertaining.

 

P.S. I’ll sell you any of the ‘art’ I created as an NFT for a bajillion cryptobux.
